personalInfo.name: Deepak Dhingra
personalInfo.summary: A forward-thinking developer offering more than 6 years of experience building, integrating, testing, and supporting Android Applications for mobile and tablet devices on the Android platform seeks position with a top technology firm.

skills: Developed 10+ fully functional Android applications for Mobile and Tablet devices.
Known for good coding practices i.e. writing efficient, maintainable, and reusable code.
Ability to collaborate with User Experience (UX) to ensure the app has a native look and feel, using Google’s Material Design guideline.
Proficient in design review, architecture, problem-solving, discussions for new features, innovations and the overall app and code reviews

professionalExperience.title: Sr. Android Developer
professionalExperience.description: Senior Android developer for Mobile Programming India Pvt. Ltd. Collaborated with marketing, key executives, UI designers, and other developers to develop cutting-edge applications for the financial services sector without jeopardizing privacy or security.
responsibilities: Ensured applications are properly integrated with Android APIs.
Worked on Bluetooth Low Energy for supporting the BLE device like activity monitor watch, Blood Pressure Machine, weight scale, etc.
Worked on Near Field Communication (NFC) to write data in the NFC tags and get response from the NFC tags.
Participated in fast-paced development cycles, have completed 100% of deadlines ahead of schedule.
Hands-on experience in deployment to the Google Play Store.
Experience in designing, developing and configuring mobile applications to meet client requirements.
Worked with backend developers, Design Teams and made prototype, wireframes and implement according to specifications.
Worked independently and proactively identified work that needs to be done and showed flexibility to adapt new and evolving environments.

role: Used Kotlin to implement of new feature in the App.
Played important role on creating MVP pattern app architecture.
Worked on NFC (Near Field Communication) to read Data from NFC tags to display on the screen.
Designed and Implemented Views and Layouts for user interaction.
Manage UI for different screen sizes.
Involved in code review and unit-testing before releasing build to the QA and client.

Implemented BLE (Bluetooth low energy) functionality to unlock the Noke Lock.

education.educationTitle: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology (May 2013) Punjab Technical University,INDIA.
